name: Aleksandria
startIntroPart1: Hail Lyosha, may your laurus dreams bring countless glory upon thee, great Caesar of Aleksandria! Under your enlightened empire lies the vast expanse of the harsh tundra, and behind her veiled marvels hides the real strength of the Pearl of the North. Since the dawn of time your people managed to endure the arduous challenges posed by arctic life and, with a grain of ingenuity and a bit of pride, they succeded to thrive under the solitary bliss of boreal lights. Despite every type of adversity the empire still has to defy, it can steadily rely on their virtues and on your advice for its future to continue to shine.
startIntroPart2: O Alyosha, princeps Aleksandri, the Motherland calls and invokes your ambition to fulfill your destiny and lead her people. Will you patronize the flourishing of arts and sciences or will you promote the thriving of arms and strife? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar:
The deeds sing, goddess, of the Motherland's son,
whose war enterprises brought countless glories upon the Comrades,
and sent forth to Hades many valiant enemies.
attacked:
Finally someone ambitious enough to try to win me over.
May you succeed or die under my triumph.
defeated:
I know nothing about what I ignore - I'm aware of it -
and yet still my latest realization burns my soul almost as much,
in pride, I have burnt till now.
introduction:
Zdravstvuyte! I am Alyosha, the empiring prince of our glorious Motherland.
And I also happen to be the creator of 'The GUR' mod.
neutralYes: Our people are eager to accept.
hateLetsHearIt: Have you come here to negotiate your surrender?
hateYes: Its nice to see that we agree on something, from time to time.
afterPeace:
I must admit your military genius astonished me.
Consider yourself honored by my most sincere respect.
hateHello: Why are you still on this side of the Acheron?
tradeRequest:
Some believe that trade is the engine of the world.
Would you like to move it in this direction?
uniqueText:
Gain +1 [Culture] from every Camp and Pasture adjacent to Tundra
+1 [Science] from every Mine and Quarry next to Tundra
The amounts of bonus [Culture] and [Science] double during a Golden Age
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [Camp] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Culture] from every [Pasture] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Science] from every [Mine] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Science] from every [Quarry] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Culture] from every [Camp] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Culture] from every [Pasture] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Science] from every [Mine] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Science] from every [Quarry] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>

name: Austria
startIntroPart1: Noble and virtuous Queen Maria Theresa, Holy Roman Empress and sovereign of Austria, the people bow to your gracious will. Following the death of your father King Charles VI, you ascended the thone of Austria during a time of great instability, but the empty coffers and diminished military did litle to dissuade your ambitions. Faced with war almost immediately upon your succession to the throne, you managed to fend off your foes, and in naming your husband Francis Stephen co-ruler, assured your place as Empress of the Holy Roman Empire. During your reign, you guided Austria on a new path of reform - strengthening the military, replenishing the treasury, and improving the educational system of the kingdom.
startIntroPart2: Oh great queen, bold and dignified, the time has come for you to rise and guide the kingdom once again. Can you return your people to the height of prosperity and splendor? Will you build a civilization that stands the test of time?
declaringWar: Shame that it has come this far. But ye wished it so. Next time, be so good, choose your words more wisely.
attacked: What a fool ye are! Ye will end swiftly and miserably.
defeated: The world is pitiful! There's no beauty in it, no wisdom. I am almost glad to go.
introduction: The archduchess of Austria welcomes your Eminence to... Oh let's get this over with! I have a luncheon at four o'clock.
tradeRequest: I see you admire my new damask. Nobody should say that I am an unjust woman. Let's reach an agreement!
uniqueText:
Gain an additional +1 [Gold] and +1 [Science] per enacted policy every time you enter a new era
Policies are adopted 10% faster
Spies operate if they were one level more experienced when rigging elections in City-States (when espionage is enabled)
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by 10 (when espionage is disabled)
uniques: [-10]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
[+1 Science, +1 Gold] per [1] social policies adopted <during the [Classical era]>
[+2 Science, +2 Gold] per [1] social policies adopted <during the [Medieval era]>
[+3 Science, +3 Gold] per [1] social policies adopted <during the [Renaissance era]>
[+4 Science, +4 Gold] per [1] social policies adopted <during the [Industrial era]>
[+5 Science, +5 Gold] per [1] social policies adopted <during the [Modern era]>
[+6 Science, +6 Gold] per [1] social policies adopted <during the [Atomic era]>
[+7 Science, +7 Gold] per [1] social policies adopted <during the [Information era]>
[+8 Science, +8 Gold] per [1] social policies adopted <during the [Future era]>
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [10] <when espionage is disabled>

name: Brunei
declaringWar: Prepare for war!
attacked: You shall regret this!
defeated: The victory is yours.
introduction: Salam, leader of the nation. I am the Sultan and Yang di-Pertuan Of Brunei and the Prime Minister Of Brunei. What brings you here to the land of wealth?
tradeRequest: Come, let us sign a trade agreement!
uniques: Comment [-33% maintenance costs for Water units]
Comment [Water units may heal outside of friendly territory]
Comment [Water units can build Water improvements on tiles]
[Water] units gain the [Sea Nomads] promotion <hidden from users>
[Water] units gain the [Supply] promotion <hidden from users>

name: Indonesia
startIntroPart1: Honour be with you, oh great hero Gajah Mada, prime minister of Majapahit and uniter of the Indonesian archipelago. The stories of your heroism on the battlefield are bested only by the legends of your sworn oath to unite the far-flung islands of Indonesia under one banner. Serving your queen and empire with loyalty, you not only strive to fulfill your oath and conquered any who stood in your path, but you succeeded in capturing what was then the entirety of the known archipelago, the first to unite what is today modern Indonesia.
startIntroPart2: Mighty warrior Gajah Mada, your people yearn for a strong leader who can return them to prosperity! Will you set out to conquer the neighboring kingdoms, further expanding your glory of your empire? Will you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Don't mean to stand in your way, but I have to protect them!
attacked: How dare you! Really insignificant as well!
defeated: You may win, but you cannot win upon my spirit.
introduction: You came before the great warrior, Gajah Mada from Nusantara!
hateHello: Are you a male concubine, stranger?
tradeRequest: What if we make a deal, you and me?
uniques: Free [Kris Swordsman] appears <upon founding a city>

name: Israel
startIntroPart1: May the Lord God bless you, honorable King David, leader of a secular nation called Israel. You succeeded in truly unifying the Israelite tribes, and set up a monarchical government, the first to ever embrace Judaism. Embarked on successful military campaigns against Israel's enemies, you defeated nearby regional entities such as the Philistines, thus creating secure borders for your kingdom. Under your holy guidance, Israel grew into a regional power. Under your House, the united Kingdom of Israel achieved prosperity and superiority over its neighbours. The prosperity of your kingdom would continue under your wise son Solomon.
startIntroPart2: King David, your people still lie scattered through the world, longing for a mighty leader to truly unite them. Will you listen their clamor? Will you once again bring the light of the Lord upon the world? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: God has spoken to me, and has told me that war between us has become inevitable!
attacked: I have the power of God at my side, so I have no reason to fear you.
defeated: My Lord has punished my people, but we shall return to the light.
introduction: My blessings to thou, stranger. I am King David, and I guide the people of Israel.
tradeRequest: The Lord smiles upon us both today.

name: Nubia
startIntroPart1: Blessings of Amun be upon thee, o magnificent Amanitore, Kandake Queen of Nubia and Kush! Your ancestors include legendary Piye, he who conquered Egypt after centuries of subjugation, and yours is a land of wealth and plenty, located high up the Nile river, between Egypt and Ethiopia. While ruling alongside your son Natakamani, you were involved in restoring large temples at Meroe and Napata, demolished by the evil Romans, your contemporaries, and the building of over two hundred nubian pyramids, as if your people were the true heirs of the ancient Egyptian empire of about a millennia earlier. Your rule marked the prosperity peak of Nubia and Meroitic history, and your civilization would exist for more than two centuries after your were gone. The kingdom of Kush only ceased to exist when Christianity was changing the world forever.
startIntroPart2: Watchful Queen of Nubia, the empire you command deserves to claim the horizon as its border, and your cities to know prosperity and piety, for the Land of the Bow honors its past as surely as it builts its own future. Will you once again replenish this parched land with the blessings of the gods and the wisdom of your divine rule? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: We have arrows, finely honed. We shall deliver them freely to your throat.
attacked: As predicted, you know only how to take. Come, then—choose the manner of your defeat.
defeated: Though Nubia declines, our pyramids shall remain long after your plans fall to ruin.
introduction: I am Amanitore of Nubia. All are welcome in our magnificent cities — provided they come as friends.
tradeRequest: As a gesture of goodwill and generosity, I have decided to share the riches of Nubia with you. May our swords never cross.
uniqueText: Archery units are 33% faster to build and they gain +50% XP and the Accuracy I promotion
uniques: [+33]% Production when constructing [Archery] units [in all cities]

name: Dublin
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Ireland!
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Ireland. Can you hear it?
uniques: "Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game

name: Meldar
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!
uniques: "Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game

name: Ferrix
declaringWar: The Empire is a disease that thrives in darkness, it is never more alive than when we asleep. It’s easy for the dead to tell you to fight, and maybe it’s true, maybe fighting is useless. Perhaps it’s too late. But I’ll tell you this, if I could do it again, I’d wake up early and be fighting those bastards from the start! Fight the Empire!
attacked: But we were sleeping. I’ve been sleeping. And I’ve been turning away from the truth I wanted not to face. There is a wound that won’t heal at the center of the galaxy. There is a darkness reaching like rust into everything around us. We let it grow, and now it’s here. It’s here and it’s not visiting anymore. It wants to stay.
defeated: For Ferrix. Stone and Sky.
uniques: "Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game

name: Königsberg
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: May the Heavens forgive you for inflicting this humiliation to our people.
